definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: give (v. BH; Targum rare; OAram. [[נתן]], Impf. [[ינתן]], so Nab.; Zinj. Palm. [[יתן]]; Eg. Aram. Impf. [[אנתן]], [[ינתן]], etc., S-C:Pap. A 7 +, pl. sf. [[תנתנונה]] ib.:J 9, Inf. [[למנתן]] S-C:C 6, 9+);—
give, subj. God, c. sf. rei + [[ל]] pers., Da 4:14, Da 4:22, Da 4:29.
of man, give, allow, acc. time, Da 2:16.
give, pay, acc. rei, Ezr 4:13, Ezr 7:20 (+ [[מִן]] of source), abs. v:Ezr 7:20.
